entry.title: This Lamborghini is the fastest production car ever to lap the Nürburgring
entry.content:
The Lamborghini Huracan is a fantastic supercar. But, like many great things, it can be made better — and that’s what the engineers at Lamborghini have done with the new Huracan Performante.

The Performante is 40 kilograms lighter than a standard Huracan coupe. It’s also more powerful, producing 640 horsepower and 442 pound-feet of torque from its 5.2-liter V10 — up from 610 hp and 413 pound-feet in the standard Huracan. Back in October, the Performante set a production car lap record of 6:52.01 around the Nürburgring’s Nordschleife. 0 to 62 mph happens in 2.9 seconds. Top speed is nearly 202 mph.
